analysis.key_quote: This rule is designed to dramatically reduce the scope of the CSRA by extending the confidential and policymaking designation to thousands more current government employees, thereby stripping them of the protections accorded to them under CSRA.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its violation of the Civil Service Reform Act and its potential to politicize civil service, undermine employee rights, and harm scientific integrity.
